a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD18SHepatitisB3DelayedLogic (IMMZ.D18.S.Hepatitis B.Delayed start schedule) * Schedule Table: 3-dose schedule (no birth dose + 3 doses), delayed start */ library IMMZD18SHepatitisB3DelayedLogic

def.name: First hepatitis B dose was administered

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: First hepatitis B dose was administered

a:s.a:s: "One hepatitis B primary series dose was administered"

expression.name: One hepatitis B primary series dose was administered

operand.name: First hepatitis B dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" > Member States defined lower limit

a:t.name: create
a:t.value: If delayed or interrupted scheduling of vaccination for children, adolescents and adults, 3 doses are recommended, with the second dose administered at least 1 month after the first, and the third dose 6 months after the first dose.

a:s.a:s: 'If delayed or interrupted scheduling of vaccination for children, adolescents and adults, 3 doses are recommended, with the second dose administered at least 1 month after the first, and the third dose 6 months after the first dose.'

operand.value: If delayed or interrupted scheduling of vaccination for children, adolescents and adults, 3 doses are recommended, with the second dose administered at least 1 month after the first, and the third dose 6 months after the first dose.

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: To be determined by Member States; however, there is no recommended expiration date and individuals are always eligible to be vaccinated.

def.name: Second hepatitis B dose was administered

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: Second hepatitis B dose was administered

a:s.a:s: "Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis B-containing vaccines")
